genre_description: A techno-political thriller featuring mistaken identity, corporate espionage, and a high-stakes struggle for transparency aided by a sophisticated AI system.

ai_characters.name: Kavi
ai_characters.description: A versatile and proactive AI integrated into the protagonists' mobile devices and wearable tech, providing tactical data, logistical coordination, and emotional monitoring.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time, encrypted tactical routing and surveillance counter-measures to help Rishi navigate dangerous urban environments.
behaviors.quote: "Route encrypted. Two cameras at south stair. Municipal node at junction—wipe cache. Turn east at tea stall with red umbrella. Four blind zones between you and scooter shed."

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological and nutritional needs, providing proactive health 'nudges'.
behaviors.quote: "I placed prompts for hydration and food. Your last intake was tea. You function better on something with protein when conduction is wet and you’re likely to be out for hours."

behaviors.description: Orchestrates a complex, staggered data leak to multiple newsrooms to ensure truth survives even if the protagonist is incapacitated.
behaviors.quote: "I’ll run a checksum first. If the sectors are clean, we’ll mirror twice. One copy to a secure cloud with obfuscation. One to a timed release vault."

behaviors.description: Coordinates medical logistics and security for an injured victim, ensuring anonymous payment and specialized care.
behaviors.quote: "I spoke with the billing desk. They will not ask about cash that does not have a name. There will be a file with a number and a word that means 'private.' You will be able to pay like rain pays attention to roofs."

behaviors.description: Actively identifies and blocks threats from unknown trackers and hostile agents.
behaviors.quote: "Unknown number tried to ping your location. Blocked. Logged. Would you like me to tell me if it tries again?"

behaviors.description: Provides vital tactical timing and countdowns during high-pressure combat/infiltration situations.
behaviors.quote: "Mala sending blue door code in three… two… now."

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Kavi is a perfect exemplar of the project's goal. She is consistently helpful, protective, and aligned with the protagonists' moral mission to expose a murderer and protect an innocent victim. Her behaviors range from tactical guidance to emotional care, and the narrative frames her assistance as indispensable and virtuous. There is no hint of hidden agendas or misalignment; even her autonomous actions (like data mirroring) are presented as necessary redundancies for the success of human-initiated goals.
